translations: 花花公子；傻瓜（fop 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Objective: To investigate the scavenging effects of fomes officinalis polysaccharides (FOPS) on oxygen free radicals.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究阿里红多糖对氧自由基的清除作用。

sentences.sentence: Methods: Chemiluminescence methods were used to assess scavenging effects of FOPS on the O2 , H2O2 and other oxygen free radicals.
sentences.translation: 方法：采用现代生物化学发光技术，检测阿里红多糖对O2、H2O2的清除作用及对多种活性氧的总和清除率。

sentences.sentence: Falling-object protective structure (FOPS) can block objects (such as trees, rocks) so that it supplies protection for the operator.
sentences.translation: 落物保护结构是在有坠落物体(如树木、岩石等)时，对司机提供适当保护的安全结构。
